name: Atomic Bombers
overview: Atomic Bombers is a multiplayer bomberman variant with a top down view and simplistic controls.Your mission is to kill your enemies without getting blasted yourself.. Each basic bomb explodes into a cross-shaped blast (four directions) which can destroy either enemies or blocks. In addition to the classic Bomberman gameplay, this version introduces additional gameplay mechanics, including light management, force options, atomic bombs and various illnesses that include the player gaining invulnerability or turning into a pac-man for a limited time. The game also comes with a level editor.
